## ScrollbarPair.canScrollHorizontally() method

Returns whether scrolling horizontally is enabled.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
canScrollHorizontally(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if horizontal scroll is enabled.
